articles.content:
Message of Greetings to Emir of Kuwait
    Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Jaber Al-Ahmed Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, on the occasion of the
44th national day and  the 14th anniversary of the liberation of the State of Kuwait.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the friendly Kuwaiti people continued progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Republic of Uzbekistan Appointed
articles.content:
Greetings to Kuwaiti Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Kuwaiti Prime Minister Sheikh Sabah Al-Ahmed Al-Jaber Al-Sabah on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the national day of Kuwait and the 14th anniversary of its  liberation.
 The message sincerely wished the friendly Kuwaiti people progress, prosperity and welfare as well as him a greater success in his responsible work.    
 DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun also sent a message of greetings to the Kuwaiti foreign minister.

DPRK Ambassador to Republic of Uzbekistan Appointed
    Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Phal was appointed as DPRK ambassador e.p. to the Republic of Uzbekistan according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
